messages.subject: Rainbow family camp
messages.msgSnippet: I know there are a few folks who are alternative (well, ok, we are all alternative-um, folks that are GLBT) on this list... A few weeks ago I sent information
messages.messageBody:
I know there are a few folks who are alternative (well, ok, we are all
alternative-um, folks that are GLBT) on this list...

A few weeks ago I sent information about the homeschooling camp we go to
every so often. The camp is again in April (23-25) in Southern
California.

I just found out that the same UU camp is having a Rainbow Family camp
for GLBT families and their hetersexual friends, family and supporters
(pflag people often go) at the end of March. This is an annual event...
My kids and I are going this weekend as I am goign to try to write an
article about the camp (both homeschooling and the rainbow camp, and
also this artist they have at the camp...

The camp is by Big Bear in Southern California. There is a map at the
website. I can't speak highly enough of this camp, and the people that
work there. If you go to http://www.uucamp.org/ you can get more
information about both the homeschooling camp and the Rainbow Family
camp. I also have the flyers for both camps on my computer and I can
email them to you individually.

Please feel free to pass this on to others.. They especially want to get
more people attending the homeschooling and rainbow family camp.

Joylyn
